text:
@WhiteHouse MY GOD!
FDA APPROVE THIS DRUG NOW! IT CAN SAVE LIVES!
Diffusion Pharmaceutical(DFFN) has a drug treatment for Covid-19 patients & help keep them off ventilators. It increases blood oxygen levels. They are in talks w/FDA now for accelerated clinical trials!
https://t.co/J8wZ4aOiju
